mapper.select: select * from tbl_notice order by 1 desc
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_notice(notice_id, notice_writer, notice_title, notice_subject, attach_file) values(notice_seq.nextval, #{noticeWriter}, #{noticeTitle}, #{noticeSubject},#{attachFile})
mapper.update: update tbl_notice set hit_count = hit_count+1 where notice_id = #{noticeId}
mapper.select: select b.* from( select rownum rn,a.* from( select * from tbl_notice order by 1 desc) a where rownum <= (#{page}*10)) b where b.rn > (#{page}-1)*10
